title: My daughter did a factory re-set on her google pixel 2 phone, and wi-fi won't work.
content: After a factory re-set my daughter cannot - no matter what we've tried (and we've tried everything) to connect to our home wifi. Help! She thought it might help fix her camera issues (it just collapses when she clicks on the app), but that is still an issue and no wifi is added to the list.
